content.text: My AI-driven photo insert solution with WAN 2.1 VACE provides a powerful way to seamlessly integrate new visual elements into existing footage. With this approach, I am able to reduce production costs by at least 50% compared to traditional VFX workflows, without compromising on quality.
Currently, this technique is available for still image inserts only. Full moving-image inserts are not yet supported.

title: Forest Stream
description: A peaceful stream winding through a lush, moss-covered forest. Soft morning light filters through the canopy while water glides over polished stones. The ambient soundscape and gentle motion invite a slow, meditative pause.

content.text: Captured at dawn to emphasize soft diffusion and cooler tones.

title: Urban Rush
description: Fast-paced city life captured in a bustling downtown corridor. Headlights streak into neon trails as crosswalks and storefronts pulse with energy. The rhythm of traffic, footsteps, and signage paints a vibrant portrait of the modern metropolis.

content.text: Longer shutter plus stabilized handheld to balance motion blur with legibility.

title: Mountain Clouds
description: Low clouds drift and unravel across jagged mountain peaks, revealing and concealing the ridgelines in slow motion. Shifting light sculpts the terrain, giving each moment a different character. A calm, cinematic study in scale and atmosphere.

content.text: Shot over several hours with interval ramping to keep cloud motion smooth.

title: Neon Nights
description: A rain-slicked street glows with reflections from neon signs and passing scooters. Saturated color spills across puddles while storefronts hum with late-night energy. The scene balances grit and glamour in a stylish nocturnal palette.

content.text: Selective saturation and contrast curves to emphasize chroma without clipping skintones.

title: Ocean Calm
description: Gentle waves fold onto a quiet shoreline at first light. Pastel hues wash across the water as the horizon slowly brightens. A minimalist, restorative moment that invites deep breathing and stillness.

content.text: Layered field recordings of surf and wind to create a calming bed.
